comments: [Buy 6 records and get the cheapest one for free + receive an extra record in the same style. Free shipping in Europe (EU) for orders above 125 Euro.  | extremely rare copy ... offers welcome | Stocknr: K1646 ]

seller.shipping:
ALL ORDERS THAT HAVE NOT BEEN RESPONDED ON AFTER 7 DAYS WILL BE CANCELLED WITHOUT NOTICE.

*YOUR PLACED ORDER IS THE ORDER THAT IS GOING TO BE SHIPPED. EXTRA ORDERS SHOULD BE SUBMITTED SEPARATELY*

WGW reserves the right for wrongly listed items, stock is huge so errors can occur! all orders will be double checked before getting shipped. Missing or damaged items will be reported immediately!

*If you are unsatisfied with your purchase then do not become nasty/furious/whatever mood you might be in then but just drop me a line with your complaint and we will work something out. I do not give bad ratings and do not wish to receive them too so it is a quid pro quo thing, convinced you understand.*

*WE DO NOT CHARGE PAYPAL FEES*

*No Extra Discounts!*

*We are NOT responsible for lost packages, we will do what we can to recover the packages but we will not resend anything or refund.
If You want to be 100% sure for your package ask for traceable sending.
It isn't useful for small packages, but if you buy more then 1 or 2 records it gets even very useful !!

The shipping prices for larger order are better. And it's traceable, so packages not getting lost. 
[b]Check the shipping prices below:[/b]

BE (traceable) (BPost) till 2kg (till around 8 records) - 5.50 euro
